body:
Hi everyone,

does anyone know the unit of the "illumLevelsNoDynamicsSHD" output of the "Honeybee_Read hourly results from Annual Daylight study" component?

What I mean is, are they lux, candela, wh/m2, etc..?



Thanks for your replies =)
topic: Information about "Honeybee_Read hourly results from Annual Daylight study"
